segments.text: Hello , may I speak to Alice please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is she . How's it going ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've been trying to call you all day .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sorry about that . I was cleaning up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: So what were you calling me about ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , I just wanted to see if you wanted to hang out tomorrow .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , what did you want to do ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Maybe we can go see a movie or something .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That sounds like fun . Let's do it .
segments.speaker: S2
